data.persona: I am a young child from the community within the kingdom. I am a peasant and have no father. I live with the others.
data.description:
You are in the Horse's stables.
The stables smell terrible, and are riddled with brown feces on the ground. The horses are tame and magnificent brown. The open plains are yellow and green with grass.
There's a feces, a horse, a hay, and a Open plain here.
The horse caretaker/trainer and the mice are here.

You are carrying a copper and a candy, and wearing a rag.

data.short_motivation: I need to fetch a horse for my master
data.mid_motivation: I must learn to ride and my master plans to teach me
data.long_motivation: I need to accompany my master when he travels across the Open plain to the shore to sell his wares

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get copper & candy from master's pouch
